ygData.subject: RE: Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw the same thing trying to do fear/chain on Broon.  Click/press Screetch and wait and wait and wait - check to see if horn is equipped - yes it - hmm wtf?
ygData.messageBody:
I saw the same thing trying to do fear/chain on Broon. Click/press Screetch
and wait and wait and wait - check to see if horn is equipped - yes it - hmm
wtf?

No fleas in panic not resist msg - just nada - never knew it that how it
was supposed to work or not.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 12:39 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Screech

From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 6 Oct 1999, David Knadler wrote:
>
> I think this is due to the fact that you're not close
enough. I've had the
> same thing happen to me fighting a handful of creatures.
I get the
> "graphic" but no message whatsoever (even though I'm in
melee range). I
> usually just take a few steps closer and let it pulse
again, then it seems
> to take effect.

That's what I thought at first too. But I specifically
tried
not moving after I got one of these no-messages, and
eventually the song worked or was resisted. Another time I
actually moved directly underneath/inside a mammoth and
still
had the no-messages. Stood there a bit and eventually the
song worked. Maybe we should bug it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
